resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/158159</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>158159</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3129</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Reading Cards -No 29: :Ant Artic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lesekarten - Nr. 29: :Ant Artic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cartes de Lecture - Non 29 : :Ant Artic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cartões Da Leitura - No. 29: :Ant Artic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Schedi Della Lettura - No 29: :Ant Artic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κάρτες ανάγνωσης - αριθ. 29: :Ant αρτικός</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tarjetas De la Lectura - No 29: :Ant Artic</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a reading comprehension activity where the student is required to understand the main idea and supporting details in a text and use a word map to organise these ideas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">word map</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist eine Leseerfassenaktivität, in der 
der Kursteilnehmer benoetigt wird, den Grundgedanken und die 
unterstützenden Details in einem Text zu verstehen und eine Wortkarte
zu benutzen, um diese Ideen zu organisieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est une activité de compréhension de lecture 
où l'étudiant est requis de comprendre l'idée principale et les 
détails supportants dans un texte et d'employer une carte de mot pour
organiser ces idées.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma atividade da compreensão da leitura 
onde o estudante seja requerido compreender a idéia principal e os 
detalhes suportando em um texto e usar um mapa da palavra organizar 
estas idéias.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un'attività di comprensione della 
lettura dove l'allievo è tenuto a capire l'idea principale ed i 
particolari di sostegno in un testo ed ad usare un programma di parola
per organizzare queste idee.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι μια δραστηριότητα κατανόησης ανάγνωσης 
όπου ο σπουδαστής πρέπει για να καταλάβει τη βασική ιδέα και τις
ενισχυτικές λεπτομέρειες σε ένα κείμενο και να χρησιμοποιήσει 
έναν χάρτη λέξης για να οργανώσει αυτές τις ιδέες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es una actividad de la comprensión de la 
lectura donde requieren al estudiante entender la idea principal y los
detalles que utilizan en un texto y utilizar una correspondencia de la
palabra para ordenar estas ideas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortkarte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compréhension de lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression écrite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">carte de mot</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">compreensão da leitura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mapa da palavra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comprensione della lettura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressione scritta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">programma di parola</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κατανόηση ανάγνωσης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραπτή έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χάρτης λέξης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">comprensión de la lectura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">expresión escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">correspondencia de la palabra</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

          </status>
